entry.title: Friday night: A few showers. Low 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few showers beginning early this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 22.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning then becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 22. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
